de.ityx.contex.interfaces.icat

Interface ICatPreparator


  • public interface ICatPreparator
    This preparator bean is used in "Categorizer/Configuration/Beans" field Preparator bean. It is used to automatically import the train set at the beginning of the trainings process within ICatAssembler. It may replace the whole manual importing or add additional trainings data. If you return cleanMaster == true, only trainingsdata imported by a preparator is erased. All manual imports are preserved and can't be reached by the bean.
    Author:
    root
